actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to require reports to Congress related to airports that will not deploy explosive detection systems by December 31, 2002, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends Federal aviation law to require the Under Secretary of Transportation for Security of the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) to make specified reports to Congress if TSA is unable to deploy explosive detection systems at all airports by December 31, 2002.

titles.title: A bill to require reports to Congress related to airports that will not deploy explosive detection systems by December 31, 2002, and for other purposes.
